p: As well as the distinct syndromes described above, chikungunya infection is associated with complex diseases involving multiple parts of the nervous system causing, for example, encephalomyelopathy (23 patients identified in our literature review), myeloneuropathy (24), and encephalomyeloneuropathy (24).
